👛 Affordable Times Square Guide 👛 

📍@OotoyaNY 141 W 41st  Street, Times Square, NYC

Stop by the Onigiri Counter at Ootoya for ten different onigiri flavors for only $4-6. Sides and drinks at the counter are no more than $6.50.

#TimesSquare #NYC #nyceats #nycrestaurants https://t.co/XEYT56EYtN

👛 Affordable Times Square Guide 👛

📍@TKTS 47th Street & Broadway, Times Square, NYC

Get up to 50% off Broadway and Off-Broadway tickets on Mon, Tues, Fri starting at 3pm or Wed, Thurs, and weekends starting at 11am. Download the TKTS app for live updates on shows everyday! https://t.co/agWJ3iIKKE

Start your week off right with an intimate listening experience in the top floor EWOW suite of W New York in #TimesSquare 🌟Monday, October 16th from 7pm-8pm @wnytimessquare  🎟️

https://t.co/bl6KpHl3XB https://t.co/LT9mqyzl3h

👛 Affordable Times Square Guide 👛 

📍@HavanaCentral 151 W 46th Street, Times Square, NYC

Half-priced happy hour empanadas, plus $7 happy hour cocktails (M-F, 4-7pm)

#TimesSquare #NYC #nyceats #nycrestaurants #nycfoods #cheapeats https://t.co/CJ6KyHzlFI

👛 Affordable Times Square Guide 👛

👛 Affordable Times Square Guide 👛 

📍Haven Rooftop - 132 W 47th Street, Times Square, NYC

Come for the atmosphere, stay for the happy hour deals! Get $6 beers, $9 wines, and $10 margaritas M-F from 4-6pm at this beautiful rooftop bar - Happy Hour bites $12

#nyceats #nycfoods https://t.co/yOU6t7tZsF

Last night, for the 17th year, @metopera opened their season in #TimesSquare 🎭 Audiences gathered on Duffy Square to experience Jake Heggie’s Dead Man Walking broadcast live on the screens at the Crossroads of the World.

📸 Photos by @lizligon https://t.co/M6dZSz7IXp

Tonight Times Square is an open-air opera stage for all with @metopera’s Opening Night of Dead Man Walking. The new season of 2023 -2024 starts tonight as Jake Heggie’s Dead Man Walking, in a haunting new production by Ivo van Hove. https://t.co/Q1Y4zz7NNF
